content: Inner classes compile to separate ".class" bytecode files, with the name of the enclosing class, followed by a "$", followed by the name of the inner class. So for example, the above inner class would be compiled to a file named "OuterClass$InnerClass.class".
stemmed: inner class compil separ `` .class '' bytecod file , name enclos class , follow `` $ '' , follow name inner class . So exampl , inner class would compil file name `` outerclass $ innerclass.class '' .
